settings.text:
MAIZON complements industry-leading stores with genuinely outstanding items in the
categories of homeware, jewellery, beauty, lifestyle, health, accessories and
more.

Vanessa Kaiser and Caroline Pezzetta, the owner of STUDIO
PEZZETTA - one of the leading high end Showrooms for DACH region (www.studio-pezzetta.com), have created a digital space in order to connect selected lifestyle brands with leading multi brand stores across Europe. 

Having spent over 20 years at the cutting-edge of fashion and e-commerce, we have
nurtured longstanding relationships with global clients and suppliers who share
our unique vision – enabling us to create a market-leading b2b business designed to both elevate and inspire.
